name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Jeffrey Michael BORRIN, Respondent

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Jeffrey Michael BORRIN, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of June 2011, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, as stated by petitioner is:
Whether the Superior Court erred in reversing the trial court’s order correcting a clerical error and clarifying the court’s judgment of sentence?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
22 A.3d 1020
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Jeffrey Michael BORRIN, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 21, 2011.
